opinions.snippet:
Daniel T. Hogan, Judge.
Introduction
{¶ 1} Plaintiffs, the cities of Upper Arlington and Dublin, seek a declaration that R.C. Chapter 4939 (“Chapter 4939”) is unconstitutional. It was enacted as a rider on an 855-page biennial appropriations bill. These are consolidated appeals from an Order entered by the court en banc dismissing appellants’ exceptions to the Chancellor’s findings. For the reasons set forth below, we affirm the lower court’s Order.
